name: @ptkdev/svelte-electron-boilerplate
description: Create a desktop app with this user friendly Svelte boilerplate for electron
author: Patryk Rzucid≈Ço [@ptkdev] <support@ptkdev.io> (https://ptk.dev)

scripts.setup: ts-node --skip-project scripts/setup.ts && ts-node --skip-project scripts/changelog.ts && npm run pre-commit
scripts.dev: npm run git-hash && ts-node scripts/configs.ts && ts-node scripts/debug.ts --enable && rollup -c -w
scripts.build:client: ts-node scripts/configs.ts && ts-node scripts/rmdist.ts && ts-node scripts/debug.ts --disable && rollup -c
scripts.release: ts-node scripts/rmdist.ts && npm run build:client && npm run build:desktop && electron-builder --dir
scripts.build-mac: ts-node scripts/rmdist.ts && npm run build:client && npm run build:desktop && electron-builder --dir --mac dmg
scripts.build-win: ts-node scripts/rmdist.ts && npm run build:client && npm run build:desktop && electron-builder --dir --win portable
scripts.build-win-32bit: ts-node scripts/rmdist.ts && npm run build:client && npm run build:desktop && electron-builder --dir --win portable --ia32
scripts.build-lnx: ts-node scripts/rmdist.ts && npm run build:client && npm run build:desktop && electron-builder --dir --linux appImage deb rpm
scripts.git-set-upstream: git remote add upstream git@github.com:ptkdev-boilerplate/svelte-electron-boilerplate.git && git fetch upstream
scripts.git-pull-upstream: git pull upstream main && git pull upstream beta && git pull upstream nightly
scripts.git-ignore-reset: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m "[Fix] Removing all files in .gitignore"
scripts.npm-publish-beta: git checkout beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.npm-publish-nightly: git checkout nightly && npm publish --tag nightly
scripts.pre-commit: npm run contributors-generate && npm run all-shields-generate && npm run lint-fix && npm run test
scripts.pkg-clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && husky install
scripts.pkg-upgrade: npx --yes npm-check-updates -u && npm install && husky install
